Class OETree

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.oereader.OEBase

  • public class OETree
extends OEBase
    Stores tree information from the .dbx file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OETree

        public OETree(byte[] data,
      int i)
        Reads a tree of data recursively from the root node of the file. Reads and reconstructs the tree of data for perusal later.
        Parameters:
        data - data to be read
        i - index to start from
